Sure! Here’s a draft for your article:

**Common Workout Mistakes People Make**

When it comes to working out, many people fall into common traps that can hinder their progress and lead to injuries. Here are some of the most frequent mistakes people make, along with tips to avoid them:

1. **Overeating Before Workouts**
   Eating a large meal right before a workout can lead to discomfort and reduced performance. It’s best to have a light snack about an hour before exercising to keep your energy levels stable.

2. **Proper Hydration (Not Too Much)**
   Staying hydrated is crucial, but drinking too much water can dilute your electrolyte levels and cause cramps. Aim for about 16-20 ounces of water about 30 minutes before your workout.

3. **No Alcohol**
   Alcohol can impair your coordination and judgment, making it dangerous to exercise. It’s best to avoid alcohol for at least 24 hours before working out.

4. **Posture**
   Poor posture can lead to muscle imbalances and increase the risk of injury. Make sure to maintain good alignment during exercises, especially when lifting weights.

5. **Not Working Out on an Empty Stomach**
   While some people believe fasting before a workout is beneficial, it can actually decrease your performance. Eating a small, light meal or snack about an hour before working out can help fuel your workout.

6. **Stretching**
   Incorporate stretching into your warm-up and cool-down routines to improve flexibility and reduce the risk of injury. Focus on dynamic stretches for the warm-up and static stretches for the cool-down.

By avoiding these common mistakes, you can enhance your workout experience and achieve better results. Remember to listen to your body and adjust your routine as needed.
</response>

gts:
Singles’ Day is China’s spending event of the year, with sales reaching a record $115 billion in 2020.

As consumers shop, ecommerce employees and delivery companies work overtime to keep the spree going.

Distribution centers bear the brunt of the workload and have to move billions of packages in days.

Singles’ Day proper started in China on Thursday, marking the beginning of the country’s largest online spending fest.

While this year’s event included a discount period on November 1, the true 24-hour sales frenzy traditionally launches on November 11, when consumers flood online shopping platforms like Alibaba’s Taobao and its rival JD.com.

Despite a crackdown this year from Beijing on lavish spending and consumer waste, reports creeping in from local media indicate Singles’ Day is still going strong, with 382 brands each hitting $15 million in sales since the start of this year’s event.

Here are some photos that show how China moves billions of packages to hundreds of cities on its biggest spending day.

gts:
InPoker announces partnership with DareNFT, an NFT 2.0 protocol that brings innovation to the world of digital assets InPoker Nov 23, 2021·2 min read

InPoker and DareNFT are pleased to announce they have entered into a strategic partnership to combine DareNFT’s innovative NFT ecosystem with InPoker ambitious e-sports vision.

DareNFT is an universal NFT 2.0 protocol for digital assets. DareNFT has developed a suite of products to address some of the challenges in the NFT landscape, including unrecognized benefits between NFTs, unrecognized relationships between NFT owners and hidden risks of NFT ownership. There are many content types out there and whereas the content types matter at application level, the licensing protocol layer is the same for all of them. Therefore, there is only one protocol needed to serve all.

The existing licencing processes of derivative content are mostly manual and time consuming. With an NFT 2.0 smart contract, these processes can be automated. Derivative content such as: song remixes, subtitled videos, edited images, learning contents, translated book often generates revenue from the rental and subscription business model. Creators can receive royalties from reproducer’s revenue via the NFT smart contract. This speeds up collaboration and sharing of benefits between the author and re-publisher, resulting in more income for both parties.

The advent of the NFT 2.0 protocol that DareNFT proposes can mark a new milestone for nonfungible tokens and the crypto market in general. The platform’s competitive advantage is its ability to adapt to emerging trends, banking on its NFT 2.0 protocol which is an essential element for building a thriving platform.

DareNFT will provide InPoker with the access to its ecosystem and the NFT marketplace where InPoker plans to list some of the Elite NFT membership cards. This long-term partnership marks a significant milestone in InPoker’s efforts to introduce the cutting edge technologies to online gaming.

Visit DareNFT: https://darenft.com/

Stay tuned for more exciting developments on https://www.inpoker.io

Join our official Telegram Channel here: https://t.me/influencerpoker

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article on the top 5 health benefits of cosmetic dentistry, tailored for Missouri City residents:

---

**Top 5 Health Benefits of Cosmetic Dentistry**

Cosmetic dentistry isn’t just about making your smile look beautiful. It’s also about improving your overall health and well-being. Here are the top 5 health benefits of cosmetic dentistry, dispelling the misconception that it’s only for looks.

1. **Preventing Gum Disease Through Corrected Alignment**
   Crooked teeth can trap food particles and plaque, leading to gum disease. By correcting the alignment of your teeth, you reduce the risk of gum disease, which can lead to serious health issues like heart disease and diabetes.

2. **Improved Digestion From Better Bite Function**
   A proper bite function is crucial for efficient digestion. When your teeth are misaligned, it can cause you to chew food unevenly, leading to digestive issues. Correcting your bite can help you chew food more effectively, improving your digestion and overall health.

3. **Reduced Risk of Tooth Decay Via Fissure Sealing**
   Fissure sealing is a preventive dental procedure that protects the grooves in your back teeth from decay. By sealing these grooves, you reduce the risk of cavities and tooth decay, keeping your teeth healthy and strong.

4. **Enhanced Speech Clarity**
   Misaligned teeth can affect your speech, making it difficult to pronounce certain words clearly. Correcting your bite can improve your speech clarity, making it easier to communicate effectively.

5. **Long-Term Oral Health Maintenance**
   Regular cosmetic dental procedures can help maintain your oral health over the long term. By addressing issues early, you can prevent more serious problems from developing, ensuring a healthy, beautiful smile for years to come.

---

Feel free to adjust any of these points to better fit your audience and style. Let me know if you need any further revisions!
</response>

### Why Website Optimization Matters
Website optimization is crucial for small businesses looking to improve their online presence and attract more visitors. By optimizing your website, you can enhance user experience, increase search engine rankings, and ultimately drive more traffic to your site.

### On-Page Techniques (e.g., Keywords, Meta Tags)
To optimize your website on a page-by-page basis, consider the following techniques:
- **Keywords**: Use relevant keywords naturally in your content to help search engines understand what your page is about.
- **Meta Tags**: Ensure your meta title and description are compelling and include your primary keywords.
- **Internal Links**: Use internal links to guide users through your site and help search engines understand the structure of your site.

### Off-Page Strategies (Backlinks, Social Signals)
Off-page strategies are also important for improving your website’s visibility:
- **Backlinks**: Acquire high-quality backlinks from reputable sites to boost your site’s authority.
- **Social Signals**: Engage with your audience on social media platforms to increase your site’s visibility and encourage sharing.

### Measuring Success
To ensure your website optimization efforts are successful, track the following metrics:
- **Traffic**: Monitor the number of visitors to your site and how they are sourced.
- **Conversion Rates**: Measure how many visitors are converting into customers.
- **SEO Rankings**: Use tools like Google Analytics and SEMrush to track your site’s search engine rankings.

By implementing these strategies, you can enhance your website’s performance and achieve better results for your small business.
</response>

**The Return of the VCT and the Impact of Game Changers on Valorant’s Competitive Scene**

In 2022, the Valorant Competitive Scene saw a significant return with the reintroduction of the VCT (Valorant Champions Tour) and the launch of the Game Changers tournament. These events have not only revitalized the competitive landscape but also brought new dimensions to the game, particularly in terms of inclusivity and diversity.

The VCT, which was last seen in 2020, has been reimagined to include a three-tier system. This structure aims to cater to a broader audience, from casual players to competitive pros. The top tier, known as the VCT Global Finals, features the world’s best teams competing for the ultimate prize. The middle tier, the VCT Regional Finals, allows teams from different regions to showcase their skills, while the lower tier, the VCT Qualifiers, provides a pathway for aspiring teams to climb the ranks.

The Game Changers tournament, introduced in 2022, has been a game-changer for Valorant’s competitive scene. This tournament focuses on inclusivity and diversity, ensuring that players from various backgrounds and skill levels can participate and compete. The tournament features a variety of formats, including team-based and individual matches, and offers significant prize pools to attract a wide range of players.

The introduction of the three-tier system and the Game Changers tournament have made the Valorant Competitive Scene more accessible and inclusive. These changes have not only attracted new players but have also helped to level the playing field, ensuring that the best players, regardless of their background, have the opportunity to compete at the highest level.

For casual fans, the VCT and Game Changers tournaments offer a chance to watch some of the best players in the world compete in exciting matches. For competitive fans, these events provide a platform for the best teams to showcase their skills and compete for the ultimate prize.

In conclusion, the return of the VCT and the launch of the Game Changers tournament have transformed the Valorant Competitive Scene. These changes have not only made the scene more accessible but have also ensured that the best players, from all walks of life, have the opportunity to compete at the highest level.

gts:
The Return of the Valorant Champions Tour Tournament in 2022

With the recent conclusion of the 2021 Valorant VCT Champions Tournament, competitive players are left asking… what's next for the Valorant Competitive scene in 2022?

I can easily say that the competitive scene in 2021 for Valorant was a massive success. Valorant brought in the masses of audiences across the globe. Even with the disruption of the pandemic, the support and strength backed by several big organizations and influencers are going incredibly strong.

Riot Games has announced the road map for the Valorant Champions Tour for the 2022 year, but there are several exciting changes to look forward to in 2022.

2022 Valorant Champions Tour roadmap — addition of Game Changers circuit

2022 VCT will keep the same three-tier system: Challengers, Masters, and Champions. Each Challenger stage will still have open-qualifiers. The game is still relatively new, so this is key to allowing new and fresh talent to emerge into the competitive scene. The new addition is Valorant Game Changes, which will be the first-ever international LAN tournament for female and non-binary professional gamers. In the competitive Valorant scene, we have seen several large e-sport organizations, such as C9 and TSM FTX, who have signed several all-female rosters. I believe that this is a huge milestone for the e-sport competitive scene as it creates a safe space that is driven by inclusivity.

Sure! Here’s a simple article about the Zone Diet for weight loss, focusing on how it works and why it’s popular:

**The Zone Diet: A Balanced Approach to Weight Loss**

The Zone Diet, developed by Dr. Barry Sears, is a popular weight loss plan that emphasizes a balanced macronutrient ratio to help control hunger and promote weight loss. Unlike many other diets that focus on strict calorie counting or restrictive food choices, the Zone Diet is designed to be more sustainable and effective in the long run.

**Macronutrient Balance and Insulin Response**

The Zone Diet focuses on a 4:1:1 macronutrient ratio of carbohydrates to protein to fat. This balance helps to keep insulin levels stable, which is crucial for maintaining a healthy weight. Insulin is a hormone that regulates blood sugar levels; when insulin levels are too high, it can lead to weight gain and other health issues. By keeping insulin levels in check, the Zone Diet helps to reduce inflammation in the body, which is another key factor in weight loss.

**5-6 Meals a Day**

One of the unique aspects of the Zone Diet is the emphasis on eating 5-6 small meals throughout the day. This approach helps to keep your metabolism active and prevents overeating. Instead of the typical 3-meal diet, the Zone Diet encourages you to eat more frequently, which can help to maintain a steady energy level and reduce the likelihood of mid-day hunger pangs.

**Why It’s Popular**

The Zone Diet is popular because it provides a sustainable approach to weight loss that doesn’t require extreme restrictions or counting calories. By focusing on a balanced macronutrient ratio and eating smaller, more frequent meals, the Zone Diet helps to keep your body in a state of metabolic balance. This can lead to long-term weight loss and improved overall health.

In summary, the Zone Diet is a balanced approach to weight loss that emphasizes a 4:1:1 macronutrient ratio, frequent meals, and a focus on insulin balance. By keeping insulin levels stable and eating smaller, more frequent meals, the Zone Diet can help you achieve and maintain a healthy weight.
</response>
gts:
As one of the newer diets on the market, the Zone Diet is rapidly taking hold as one of the best and most popular. Like many on the market, the Zone Diet is the result of many years of intense study into the way the human body uses the food sources it is given. Through this research, the folks at Zone Diet have managed to find a way to make your body use the food to its fullest advantage and make you lose weight. The Zone Diet is gaining wide spread acceptance as a true form of weight loss and anything but a fad diet.

Dr. Sears is the man responsible for the Zone Diet and all of its inner workings. For years he has studied the effects that certain foods have on the bodies fat burning potential. With this research he has found the formula of foods and drinks that actually spur the body into over drive and help it to burn off the unnecessary fat and make you lose weight.

The Zone Diet is nothing like the other starvation diets that have come down the pike. In most cases you do not have to give up the foods that you love, but simply make adjustments in the daily regimen. This all speaks to the unique way that the Zone Diet works. Instead of cutting out the meals the Zone Diet adds two additional meals to the daily routine.

The Zone Diet works to stabilize and increase the insulin output of the body. With this insulin the body can more readily burn the fat to make certain that you are losing weight. This diet does not work in miracles or days even. There is a standard amount of time that you will need to work to make sure that you have maintained the proper procedures in the diet. This will help to build the bodies natural defenses against weight gain. With this manner you will be training your body to accept and decline certain foods in order to keep the weight that you lose off.

The Zone Diet is being actively referred to as the diet of the stars. Many of those in Hollywood and surrounding areas have found that the Zone Diet is vastly superior to the other diets currently on the market and therefore increasing its popularity to new levels.

**Essential Features for an NFT Marketplace**

An NFT marketplace is a crucial platform for buying, selling, and trading non-fungible tokens. To stand out, a marketplace should offer robust features that enhance user experience and ensure security. Here are some key features that make a platform stand out:

1. **User-Friendly Interface**: A clean and intuitive interface is essential for a seamless user experience. Users should be able to easily navigate through the marketplace, find and purchase NFTs, and manage their collections.

2. **Secure Transactions**: Security is paramount in NFT trading. The platform should implement robust encryption and secure payment gateways to protect users’ funds and prevent fraud.

3. **High-Quality Listings**: Listings should be well-organized and visually appealing. High-quality images and detailed descriptions help users make informed decisions.

4. **Advanced Search and Filtering**: Users should be able to filter listings by various criteria such as price, popularity, and category. Advanced search options can help users find exactly what they are looking for.

5. **Community Features**: A vibrant community can drive engagement and sales. Features like forums, social media integration, and user-generated content can foster a lively marketplace.

6. **Maticz Services**: Maticz offers specialized services for NFT marketplaces, including ‘NFT Marketplace Design Development’ and ‘Technical Support’. These services ensure that your platform is not only functional but also visually appealing and technically sound.

7. **24/7 Support**: Reliable customer support is crucial for addressing any issues promptly. A dedicated support team can help users with technical problems, account issues, and other concerns.

By incorporating these features, your NFT marketplace can attract and retain users, ensuring a thriving ecosystem for NFT trading.

Sure! Here’s a concise article about digital marketing for small business owners and entrepreneurs:

**What is Digital Marketing?**
Digital marketing is the use of internet and online technologies to promote products, services, and brands. It includes various strategies such as SEO (Search Engine Optimization), social media marketing, and email marketing.

**Why is Digital Marketing Important?**
In today’s digital age, having a strong online presence is crucial for small businesses. Digital marketing helps level the playing field by providing resources and tools that were previously only available to larger corporations. By leveraging SEO, social media, and email marketing, small businesses can attract more customers, increase brand awareness, and drive sales.

**Key Strategies:**
1. **SEO (Search Engine Optimization):** Optimize your website and content to rank higher in search engine results pages (SERPs). This helps attract more organic traffic to your site.
2. **Social Media Marketing:** Use platforms like Facebook, Instagram, and LinkedIn to engage with your audience, share content, and promote your products. Social media can help build brand loyalty and increase visibility.
3. **Email Marketing:** Send targeted emails to your subscribers to keep them informed about your products, offers, and news. Email marketing can be a cost-effective way to nurture leads and drive conversions.

By implementing these strategies, small businesses can effectively reach their target audience, build a strong online presence, and achieve their marketing goals. Remember, consistency and quality are key in digital marketing.
  
**How It Helps Small Businesses:**
Digital marketing provides small businesses with the tools and resources to compete with larger companies. With SEO, you can improve your website’s visibility in search results, making it easier for potential customers to find you. Social media marketing allows you to connect with your audience in real-time, fostering engagement and building a community around your brand. Email marketing helps you stay top-of-mind with your customers, ensuring they are aware of your latest products and offers.

Feel free to ask any specific questions or provide more details if you need further information on any of these strategies!
</response>

What is digital marketing?

Digital marketing is the advertising of a business, person, product, or service using online channels, electronic devices, and digital technologies. A few examples of it include social media, email, pay-per-click, search engine optimizations, and more.

Digital marketing is important because it helps you drive more qualified traffic. You reach more leads that are interested in your business. The ability to target specific leads helps you drive traffic that makes interest in your company or business. You can target leads specifically by different characteristics.

This industry is one of the fastest-growing sectors in technology. Such growth comes with incredible rewards and a commendable fortune for those who have the skills. It is also competitive since the skills are self-thought.

Digital marketing is the component of marketing that utilizes internet and online based digital technologies. Such as desktop computers mobile phones and other digital media and platforms to promote products and services.

Let’s talk about marketing goals and objectives are set by business house to promote, its good and services to its customers, within a specific timeframe. Marketing objectives are the planning to set to attain the overall growth of the organization.

When it comes to particular product, a company s marketing strategy may include increasing product awareness, providing information about product features, and reducing consumer resistance.

It provides small and medium businesses the chance to compete and attract their share of targeted traffic. Small companies now have the resources to perform sales and marketing processes that were earlier available to large corporate only.

At a high level digital marketing refers to advertising delivered through digital channels. Such as search engines, websites, social media, Email and mobile apps. Using these online media channels digital marketing is the method by which companies endorse goods services and brands.

Sure! Here’s a short article about attestation services in Dubai:

**Attestation Services in Dubai: Why They’re Important and How They Work**

Attestation services in Dubai are crucial for businesses and individuals looking to ensure the authenticity and validity of documents. These services are particularly important for expats, who often need to prove their identity or business credentials to local authorities.

**Why Attestation Services Are Important**

Attestation services help to validate the authenticity of documents, ensuring that they are recognized and accepted by local authorities. This is especially important for documents that need to be presented in a formal setting, such as business licenses, academic certificates, and personal identification documents.

**How the Process Works**

The process of attestation typically involves several steps:

1. **Document Preparation**: The original document is prepared and verified by the relevant authority.
2. **Attestation**: The document is then sent to a recognized attestation service provider, such as Genius Attestation Services.
3. **Verification**: Genius Attestation Services verifies the document and ensures its authenticity.
4. **Issuance**: The attested document is then issued and sent back to the client.

**Genius Attestation Services**

Genius Attestation Services is a leading provider of attestation services in Dubai. They are known for their quick turnaround times and affordable prices. Their services are designed to meet the needs of both businesses and individuals, ensuring that all documents are processed efficiently and accurately.

In conclusion, attestation services in Dubai are essential for ensuring the validity and acceptance of documents. Genius Attestation Services is a reliable provider that offers quick and affordable services, making it a top choice for anyone in need of attestation services.

If you have any questions or need further assistance, please don’t hesitate to reach out.
</response>

In today’s world, identity theft is a major problem. If you have your identity stolen, it can take years to get it back. In order to avoid this, many people have started getting attestation services in Dubai.

These services are a type of authentication process in which the higher authorities validates a person’s identity. It can be used for a variety of things, including getting a driver’s license, opening a bank account, or for anything else where you need to prove your identity.

The attestation process starts with a person going to the embassy of the country they want to attest their identity. The embassy will then make a copy of the person’s passport and other documents.

Need of Attestation services in Dubai

Attestation services in Dubai are needed for a variety of purposes, such as obtaining a new passport, getting a residence visa, getting a new driver’s license, or opening a bank account.

They are also used for a variety of purposes, such as notarizing a document, witnessing a signature, authenticating a document, and more.

It is important to attest the authenticity of any document. This includes certificates, diplomas, transcripts, degrees, passports, visas, marriage certificates, birth certificates, wills, deeds, powers of attorney, or any other documents.

Why Genius Attestation Services?

There are many reasons to have documents attested. For example, you may need to have a birth certificate certified so that you can get a passport. You may need to have a diploma certified so that you can get a job.

You may need to have a will certified so that you can get a death certificate. There are many reasons to have documents attested.

At Genius Attestation Services, we can attest your documents quickly and easily. Attestation services in Dubai are a cost-effective and secure way to verify a person’s qualifications. The process is quick and affordable, and the attestation services in Dubai are trustworthy.

Sure! Here’s a concise article on the pros and cons of having an online business, including two actionable tips:

**Pros of Having an Online Business:**

1. **Flexibility:** You can work from anywhere, which is especially beneficial if you have a family or other commitments.
2. **Cost Efficiency:** You can reduce overhead costs by avoiding the need for a physical storefront and other fixed expenses.
3. **Global Reach:** With an online business, you can reach customers worldwide, expanding your market potential.

**Cons of Having an Online Business:**

1. **Isolation:** Working from home can lead to isolation and a lack of face-to-face interaction with customers.
2. **Technical Challenges:** You need to manage your own website, marketing, and customer service, which can be time-consuming.
3. **Security Risks:** Online businesses are more vulnerable to cyber threats and data breaches.

**Actionable Tips:**

1. **Time-Blocking:** To maintain a healthy work-life balance, block specific times for work and personal activities. This helps prevent burnout and ensures you have time for family and hobbies.
2. **Budget-Friendly Tools:** Use free or low-cost tools for marketing and customer support. For example, use free email marketing services like Mailchimp or Constant Contact, and consider using free customer support platforms like Freshdesk or Zendesk for initial support.

By implementing these tips, you can enjoy the benefits of an online business while mitigating the challenges.
</response>

Marketing illustrations by Storyset

Working from home has numerous advantages, but also comes with its disadvantages.

Building a successful online business is a dream come true for many people around the world, though to some, it is not always fun and games.

Sources have it that you can survive on online businesses and enjoy the freedom of earning real money from your passions.

As earlier mentioned, running an online business is not always a walk in the park, and therefore it is wise not to underestimate the hard work that a successful online business requires.

To understand what it entails to run an online business, let us take a look at the Benefits and Costs of running online businesses.

Benefits of Running an Online Business

1) Flexible schedule and rules.

Owning an online job allows you to create your rules and be your boss. With the flexibility that comes with self-employment, one can even create time to see friends and family.

2) Low startup costs.

One key benefit of owning an online business is the low starting cost. Sources have it that you can start a website with less than $100, and as your business grows, you can invest more in it. An online business gives you the liberty of working from your house and requires no leasing costs. You do not have to worry about an employee’s salary too!

3) You become the boss.

Running your own online business gives you the mandate of setting the rules and regulations. Nobody tells you what to do, and you get an opportunity of controlling your destiny. You get to make decisions about marketing, product or service development, customer service, and pretty much everything related to your business.

Cost of Running an Online Business

1) Long working hours

For any business to succeed, it calls for hard work and long working hours. Starting an online job from scratch takes a good amount of time to be successful and in some cases, people are required to work on weekends to reach their targets.

2) Requires a lot of discipline.

With all the freedom that comes with running your own business, discipline is fundamental. The time one takes for breaks should be limited, and more focus should be made to reach the set target.

Basic Needs Come First

Pay Attention To Seasonal Sales

Furniture Deals seriously help you run through the budget constraints while furnishing your home. Users find few overloaded stock that’s not completely sold at comparatively lower prices while you may be wondering at how the seasonal sales happen.

Store Credit Cards Can Be Helpful

Sure, here’s a draft of the article comparing IC Markets and Pepperstone as forex brokers, focusing on regulation, spreads, and fees:

**IC Markets vs. Pepperstone: A Comparison of Key Differences**

When choosing a forex broker, it's crucial to consider factors such as regulation, spreads, and fees. In this article, we will compare IC Markets and Pepperstone, two popular brokers in the market.

**Regulation**

Both IC Markets and Pepperstone are regulated by the Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) in the UK, ensuring a high level of oversight and protection for traders. However, IC Markets is also regulated by the Cyprus Securities and Exchange Commission (CySEC), providing an additional layer of security for European traders.

**Spreads**

Spreads are a critical factor for forex traders, as they determine the cost of buying and selling currency pairs. IC Markets offers competitive spreads, with a typical spread of 1 pip (0.0001) for major currency pairs. Pepperstone, on the other hand, offers tighter spreads, often as low as 0.5 pips for major pairs, which can be advantageous for traders looking to minimize their costs.

**Fees**

Both brokers offer transparent fee structures. IC Markets charges a commission-based model, with fees ranging from 0.25% to 0.50% of the trade value. Pepperstone, however, offers a flat fee structure, with a standard fee of 0.5 pips for each trade, which is generally lower than IC Markets’ commission-based model.

**Inactivity Fees**

It's worth noting that both IC Markets and Pepperstone do not charge inactivity fees. The reference you mentioned was correct; both brokers have zero inactivity fees, ensuring that traders are not penalized for inactivity.

**Islamic Account Fees**

Regarding Islamic account fees, both IC Markets and Pepperstone offer Islamic-compliant accounts, which are designed to comply with Islamic financial principles. However, the specific fees for these accounts can vary, so it’s best to check directly with each broker for the most accurate information.

In conclusion, both IC Markets and Pepperstone are well-regulated and offer competitive spreads and fees. The choice between the two may depend on individual trading preferences and specific requirements, such as the need for Islamic-compliant accounts.

Let me know if you need any further clarification or if you would like to include more details on Islamic account fees.
</response>

Sure! Here’s a concise article explaining why improving public speaking skills is important:

**Why Improving Public Speaking Skills is Important**

Public speaking is a crucial skill that can significantly enhance your career and personal life. Here are some key reasons why improving your public speaking skills is important:

1. **Enhances Career Opportunities**: Employers often value candidates who can communicate effectively. Strong public speaking skills can make you stand out in job interviews and help you deliver presentations that are clear and compelling.

2. **Boosts Confidence**: Public speaking can be intimidating, but as you practice, you’ll gain confidence in your ability to articulate your ideas. This confidence can translate to other areas of your life, making you more effective in both personal and professional settings.

3. **Improves Leadership Skills**: Effective public speaking is a fundamental leadership skill. Whether you’re leading a team or a project, the ability to communicate your vision clearly and persuasively is essential.

4. **Enhances Networking**: Public speaking events are great opportunities to meet new people and build professional relationships. By speaking confidently and engaging with others, you can expand your network and open doors to new opportunities.

5. **Increases Persuasiveness**: The ability to persuade others is a valuable skill in many fields. Whether you’re trying to convince a client to sign a contract or a colleague to adopt a new idea, strong public speaking skills can help you make a compelling case.

To improve your public speaking skills, start by practicing regularly. Join a local Toastmasters club, record yourself giving presentations, and seek feedback from trusted friends or mentors. Over time, you’ll see improvements in your confidence and effectiveness.

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any more information.
</response>

Pictorial representation helps in building the interest of the listeners and grasping the maximum interest of the audience. Public speaking differs a lot from online presentations as in online medium all audiences are present in virtual form and pre-recordings are also used while in public speaking you directly address your speech to the huge crowd. Many people generally get afraid of public speaking but once you get adapted to it one will enjoy maximum interaction with the crowd in a joyful manner.

Public Speaking in a corporate field has great benefits which will ultimately help you in reaching the topmost position of your life are as follows:

The power of critical analysis and thinking develops to a great extent.

Argument on proper firm points too can be made.

Changes can be easily driven if you are a public speaker.

Sure! Here’s a simple SWOT analysis for planning your life like a marketing plan:

**Strengths:**
One of the biggest strengths of planning your life like a marketing plan is that you can identify and leverage your unique strengths. For example, if you have a knack for organizing events, you can use this skill to plan your social calendar effectively. By recognizing and enhancing your strengths, you can achieve your goals more efficiently.

**Weaknesses:**
However, there are also some weaknesses to consider. For instance, you might struggle with setting clear goals if you’re not used to the structured approach of marketing planning. It’s important to define your objectives clearly to avoid getting sidetracked.

**Opportunities:**
The opportunity lies in the vast array of resources available to you. Whether it’s online tools, books, or mentors, there’s always something new to learn. By staying informed and adaptable, you can seize new opportunities that come your way.

**Threats:**
On the other hand, there are potential threats to consider. For example, if you’re not disciplined enough, you might find it hard to stick to your plans. It’s crucial to have a backup plan and a system in place to keep you on track.

To make it even more relatable, let’s use an example from everyday life. Imagine you want to improve your fitness. You could set a goal to exercise three times a week. However, if you’re not disciplined, you might skip workouts. To overcome this, you could create a routine where you plan your workouts in advance and set reminders to ensure you stick to your schedule.

Keep paragraphs short and use everyday examples to keep the tone relatable and easy to understand.
</response>
gts:
I’m feeling a little lost. (that’s a way of starting a post han?!)

I don’t know exactly what I want, what I like, what I want to do or accomplish.

I always knew what I wanted. Since my 11th grade in High School I knew what college degree to choose. Since then I knew what I liked and what I wanted to do. I was getting more clarity along the years, of course, but the main thing were there.

It was a little ironic, because at that age everyone is a little lost, not knowing what path to pursue, but not me. I always knew.

Right now, at a age where I was supposed to have things a little more figured out, I don’t… Maybe it’s just destiny doing its things, ou some form of compensation, or just some fase.

We don’t need to have it all figured out. We don’t need to plan our lives like a Marketing Plan. We just have to live it. Just like Lilly Aldrin would say to Ted: “You can design your life like a building, you just have to live it”.

How can we just live our lives, without designing it or planning it? Well, I don’t know, but we I find out, I’ll tell you ;)

**How to Use Figma’s Auto Layout for Resumes**

Figma’s Auto Layout feature is a powerful tool for creating professional and visually appealing resumes. In this guide, we’ll cover the basics of vertical/horizontal arrangement, spacing settings, and A4 paper setup. We’ll also clarify the difference between ‘Packed’ and ‘Space between’ alignment.

### Vertical/Horizontal Arrangement

When designing a resume, you’ll want to ensure that your content is organized in a way that is easy to read and visually appealing. Here are some tips for arranging your content:

- **Vertical Arrangement**: Typically, you’ll want to stack your sections vertically, with each section starting on a new line. This makes it easier for readers to scan your resume.
- **Horizontal Arrangement**: For longer sections, you might consider using a horizontal arrangement. This can be useful for sections like your work experience or education, where you want to list multiple items side by side.

### Spacing Settings

Proper spacing is crucial for creating a clean and professional look. Here are some settings you can use:

- **Padding**: Add padding around your content to create space between elements. This can help prevent your text from being too cramped.
- **Margin**: Use margins to create space between your content and the edges of the page. This can help your content stand out and be more visually appealing.

### A4 Paper Setup

When designing your resume, it’s important to ensure that it fits on an A4 page. Here’s how to set it up:

- **Width**: Set the width to 2480px.
- **Height**: Set the height to 3508px.
- **Orientation**: Make sure the orientation is set to portrait.

### Alignment Differences

Understanding the difference between ‘Packed’ and ‘Space between’ alignment is key to creating a well-organized resume. Here’s a quick guide:

- **Packed Alignment**: This alignment is best for sections where you want all items to be tightly packed together. For example, if you’re listing your work experience, you might use packed alignment to ensure all items are neatly aligned.
- **Space between Alignment**: This alignment is better for sections where you want some space between items. For example, if you’re listing your education, you might use space between alignment to create a more visually appealing layout.

### Example: Bullet Points vs Section Headers

Here’s an example of how you might use packed alignment for bullet points and space between alignment for section headers:

**Work Experience:**
- **Company A** (2018-2020)
  - Project 1: Led a team of 5 to develop a new product.
  - Project 2: Successfully launched a new product.
- **Company B** (2020-2022)
  - Project 3: Managed a team of 10 to improve efficiency.
  - Project 4: Achieved a 20% increase in sales.

**Education:**
- **Bachelor of Science in Computer Science** (2015-2018)
  - GPA: 3.8/4.0
  - Relevant Courses: Data Structures, Algorithms, Machine Learning
- **Master of Business Administration** (2018-2020)
  - GPA: 3.9/4.0
  - Relevant Courses: Finance, Marketing, Operations Management

Feel free to adjust these settings and examples to fit your specific needs. Remember to keep your content clean and easy to read, and use proper spacing and alignment to enhance the overall look of your resume.

---

I hope this helps! Let me know if you have any other questions.
</response>

---

**Simplifying Drag and Drop Functionality in Android Apps**

Drag and drop functionality is a powerful tool for enhancing user experience in Android apps. However, implementing this feature can be complex and time-consuming. In this article, we will explore how to simplify the process of adding drag and drop functionality to your Android app.

### Introduction
Drag and drop is a feature that allows users to move items within an app or between different apps. This feature can significantly improve user engagement and make your app more intuitive. However, integrating drag and drop functionality can be challenging, especially if you are not familiar with the underlying mechanisms.

### Using the DragAndDrop Library
Fortunately, there are libraries available that can help simplify the process of adding drag and drop functionality to your Android app. One such library is the **DragAndDrop** library, which is currently in **alpha**. This means that while it is not yet fully stable, it is a great option for developers who want to experiment and provide feedback.

### Implementation Steps
Here are the steps to implement drag and drop functionality using the **DragAndDrop** library:

1. **Add the Library to Your Project**
   - Add the library to your project by including the following dependency in your `build.gradle` file:
     ```gradle
     implementation 'com.example:draganddrop:1.0.0'
     ```

2. **Set Up the Drag and Drop View**
   - Create a custom view that will act as the draggable item. This view should extend `DragAndDropView` and override the necessary methods to handle the drag and drop functionality.

3. **Handle Drag Events**
   - Override the `onDragEvent` method in your custom view to handle drag events. This method will be called whenever the user starts or ends a drag operation.

4. **Handle Drop Events**
   - Override the `onDrop` method to handle the drop event. This method will be called whenever the user drops the item onto another view.

5. **Test Your Implementation**
   - Test your implementation thoroughly to ensure that the drag and drop functionality works as expected. You can use the **DragAndDrop** library’s built-in testing framework to help with this.

### Encouraging Feedback
We encourage developers to try the **DragAndDrop** library in its **alpha** stage and provide feedback. Your input is valuable and will help us improve the library and make it more robust for future releases.

### Conclusion
Adding drag and drop functionality to your Android app can enhance user experience and make your app more engaging. By using the **DragAndDrop** library, you can simplify the process and focus on other important aspects of your app. We hope this article has provided you with the information you need to get started.

---

I hope this helps! Let me know if you need any further assistance.
</response>
gts:
At the most basic level, drag and drop is a gesture where a user can tap and hold an image, text string or other data element, then drag it into another app (or to another location in the same app) and release, where the data is incorporated in the new location. This gesture is usually a long press on touch screens or a click and drag when using a mouse.

A simple drag & drop sample.

While Android has long supported drag and drop ( DragEvent was introduced in Android 3.0, API level 11), integrating full support for handling gestures, events, permissions and callbacks has proven to be complex.

Today we’re introducing the Jetpack DragAndDrop library as an alpha release to make it easier for you to handle data dropped into your app.

Drag and drop is becoming increasingly relevant for large screen form factors: tablet and laptops, but especially also foldables, where split screen is used 7 times as often than on conventional phones. The ability to drag data from one app to another is a natural experience for users as they multitask more efficiently with their apps in split-screen or windowed modes.

While dragging text from EditTexts is supported natively by the platform, we strongly recommend enabling users to drag any images, files or text from other components of your app. Just as importantly, we encourage allowing users to drop data into your apps as well.

Dragging from one app into another.

DropHelper , in combination with DragStartHelper , makes it much easier to take care of gesture support, callbacks, styling and pixel-perfect alignment.

DragStartHelper

DragStartHelper is a utility class in Jetpack core that detects gestures commonly used to start a drag, such as long pressing or click and dragging with a mouse.

DropHelper

The new DropHelper is a utility class that takes care of listeners and drop targets. Be sure to use addInnerEditTexts() when building DropHelper.Options to ensure that any nested EditTexts inside your drop target don’t acquire focus instead.

Learn more

Read more in the Drag and drop guide on Android Developers, dive into the large screen sample to see DropHelper in practice and then try it out in alpha now to give us feedback.

Thanks to Florina, Ben and Nick!

Sure! Here’s a professional yet easy-to-understand article on bond cleaning tips for tenants:

---

**Bond Cleaning Tips for Tenants**

Bond cleaning is an essential task for tenants to maintain the cleanliness and value of their rental property. Whether you’re a first-time tenant or a seasoned one, following these practical tips can help you keep your bond clean and your landlord happy.

### Cost-Saving DIY Methods

Bond cleaning doesn’t have to be expensive. Here are some cost-effective methods you can use:

#### 1. **Vinegar and Baking Soda**
   - **Solution:** Mix equal parts white vinegar and baking soda to create a paste.
   - **Application:** Apply the paste to the bond and let it sit for about 15 minutes. Scrub with a soft brush and rinse thoroughly with water.
   - **Benefits:** Vinegar is a natural disinfectant, and baking soda is gentle on surfaces. It’s an excellent choice for removing stains and odors.

#### 2. **Bleach and Water**
   - **Solution:** Mix 1 part bleach with 3 parts water.
   - **Application:** Apply the solution to the bond and let it sit for about 10 minutes. Scrub with a brush and rinse with water.
   - **Benefits:** Bleach is effective at killing bacteria and mold. However, it’s important to use it sparingly and ensure proper ventilation to avoid respiratory issues.

#### 3. **Hydrogen Peroxide**
   - **Solution:** Mix 3 parts water with 1 part hydrogen peroxide.
   - **Application:** Apply the solution to the bond and let it sit for about 10 minutes. Scrub with a brush and rinse with water.
   - **Benefits:** Hydrogen peroxide is a powerful disinfectant and can help remove tough stains. It’s a good alternative to bleach if you prefer a gentler option.

#### 4. **Microfiber Cloths**
   - **Usage:** Use microfiber cloths to wipe down surfaces daily. They are effective at picking up dust and dirt without leaving streaks.
   - **Benefits:** Microfiber cloths are reusable and environmentally friendly. They help maintain a clean bond without the need for harsh chemicals.

### Additional Tips

- **Regular Maintenance:** Regularly clean your bond to prevent buildup of dirt and grime.
- **Check Local Regulations:** While Adelaide and Gold Coast are examples, it’s important to check your local regulations to ensure you’re following the correct procedures.
- **Professional Help:** If you’re unsure about the condition of your bond or need specialized cleaning, consider hiring a professional. However, DIY methods can often be just as effective and cost-saving.

By following these tips, you can keep your bond clean and maintain its value. Remember, a clean bond is a happy bond!

---

This article should provide you with the practical advice you need. If you have any specific questions or need further details, feel free to ask!
</response>

Sure! Here’s a draft for the section on ‘Accountability through Real-Time Data’:

**Accountability through Real-Time Data**

Nonprofit organizations can significantly enhance accountability by leveraging real-time data from their accounting software. Real-time data allows for immediate visibility into financial transactions, enabling timely adjustments and ensuring compliance with GAAP and FASB standards. By integrating real-time data into their reporting processes, nonprofits can provide stakeholders with up-to-date financial information, fostering trust and transparency.

Real-time data also facilitates proactive management. For instance, if a nonprofit detects unusual spending patterns, it can investigate the cause immediately, preventing potential financial mismanagement. This proactive approach not only improves financial oversight but also helps in maintaining compliance with regulatory requirements.

Moreover, real-time data enables nonprofits to respond swiftly to changes in financial conditions. For example, if a donor’s financial situation changes, the nonprofit can adjust its fundraising strategies in real-time, ensuring that resources are allocated efficiently. This adaptability is crucial in today’s dynamic environment, where financial landscapes can shift rapidly.

In summary, incorporating real-time data into nonprofit accounting software not only enhances accountability but also supports effective financial management and regulatory compliance.

As for the current outline, it should fit within 500 words with the added section. If you feel any part is too long or can be trimmed, please let me know, and we can make the necessary adjustments.
</response>
gts:
Nonprofits and government agencies need nonprofit accounting software to demonstrate accountability and compliance. Let’s take a deep dive into what you need to know in choosing the most compliant software.

A compliant nonprofit accounting software system tracks revenue to a designated purpose and prevents misuse of donations.

If a nonprofit wants to be compliant with GAAP and FASB 116/117, all of their funds must be grouped into two categories of net assets: (1) without donor restrictions and (2) net assets with donor restrictions, which replace the three former categories of unrestricted, temporarily restricted and permanently restricted net assets. To be GAAP-compliant, nonprofits only need two funds to report on the breakdown of net assets on IRS form 990.

Nonprofit Accounting Software Identifies Who, What and Why

In order to fully understand why nonprofits need nonprofit accounting, you need to understand three fundamental questions:

Who is the source of revenue? What is the designated purpose? Why nonprofits need to classify revenue?

1. Who is the source of revenue?

Who identifies the source of revenue and provider of services and expenses. This is know as donor designated revenue. Who is donating or granting funds to the nonprofit? Who is the nonprofit paying expenses, such as salaries, payroll taxes, services, rent, utilities?

**Blockchain and Cryptocurrencies in India: Beyond Criminals to Transparency and Efficiency**

Blockchain technology has the potential to revolutionize various sectors in India, particularly in public services and government schemes. While there are concerns that blockchain is only used by criminals, it can actually enhance transparency and reduce corruption.

One of the most critical areas where blockchain can make a significant impact is in land record management. Currently, land records in India are often prone to fraud and corruption. By implementing blockchain, each transaction can be recorded on a tamper-proof ledger, ensuring that every change is transparent and verifiable. This not only prevents fraud but also ensures that land records are accurate and accessible to all stakeholders, including the government and the public.

Another area where blockchain can improve transparency is in welfare distribution. Many government schemes in India are plagued by corruption, with funds often diverted to unscrupulous individuals. By using blockchain, each transaction can be tracked and verified, ensuring that aid reaches the intended beneficiaries. This can significantly reduce corruption and ensure that resources are used efficiently.

In addition to these, blockchain can also help in reducing the bureaucratic hurdles that often hinder the implementation of government schemes. By automating certain processes and reducing the need for intermediaries, blockchain can streamline operations and make them more efficient.

In conclusion, while blockchain is often associated with criminal activities, it has the potential to bring about significant improvements in public services and government schemes. By leveraging blockchain, India can enhance transparency, reduce corruption, and improve the delivery of essential services to its citizens.

gts:
But but blockchain is for criminals…

Too many times have we heard this argument. It is almost a meme by now. It is a bit true, but also a lot wrong. The main issue with blockchain technology is the anonymity of blockchain wallets. Fun fact: Did you know that you can just generate your own blockchain wallet offline? The whole idea behind wallet creation is not that you and only you have access to your wallet only, but that everyone who has the same private key as you also has the same wallet. The “security” only stems from one aspect: Stochastics! Two people have a very very low chance to create the same wallet. For example, MetaMask creates them using 2048 seed words. In total, you need 12 of them to create a wallet. Therefore, there are 204⁸¹² possibilities. Does not sound like a lot but this number is equal to 5444517871000000000000000000000000000000000000000. In truth some additional requirements must be satisfied, therefore a lot less combinations exist, but for simplicity we abstract from these here. All of these wallets are therefore entirely anonymous. The only way to know who has access to which address is by creating a mapping between a person’s real identity and the wallet address they have used for a transaction. Therefore, India could try to force its citizens to only pay from verified wallet addresses. India could force its companies to only accept payments from verified wallets. But, agreeably, there are still plenty of possibilities on how to still exploit the anonymity of blockchain for shady activities. There’s one crucial aspect to the blockchain though: It keeps a log of every transaction ever executed forever, redundantly backed up on thousands or even millions of servers worldwide. Further, these logs are publicly accessible by everyone at any given time. Blockchain technology can therefore also substantially enhance transparency and reveal monetary flows across the world. It acts as an ultimate threat: Yes, you can engage in illegal transactions, but should your wallet address ever become traceable back to you, even if only by accident, everyone can see what you’ve done. Therefore, India should not ban “private” (i.e.. “decentralized”) blockchains, but rather embrace them and build systems around them to enhance both their transparency and security.

Sure! Here’s a concise article about why cosigning loans is risky, focusing on the analogy of betting on a losing horse and the financial implications:

**Why Cosigning Loans is Risky: The Analogy of Betting on a Losing Horse**

When you cosign a loan, you’re essentially betting on someone else’s financial success. Just as betting on a losing horse is a high-risk strategy, cosigning a loan can be a risky move for both the borrower and the cosigner. Let’s explore why cosigning loans is risky and the financial implications involved.

**Predictable Risks: Betting on a Proven Loser**

Imagine you’re betting on a horse race. You know that the horse you’re betting on has a proven track record of losing. Despite this, you decide to bet on it anyway. The risk is clear: you might lose your bet, and the outcome is uncertain. Similarly, when you cosign a loan, you’re essentially betting on the borrower’s financial stability.

**Financial Implications: The Real Costs**

When you cosign a loan, you become legally responsible for the debt if the borrower defaults. This means you could face significant financial consequences, including wage garnishment, tax liens, and even legal action. The financial implications are predictable and can be quite severe.

**Conclusion: The Risks of Cosigning**

Cosigning a loan is a high-risk strategy, especially when the borrower has a proven track record of financial instability. The financial implications can be severe, including wage garnishment and legal action. It’s important to carefully consider the risks before deciding to cosign a loan.

If you have any specific points you’d like to add or any other questions, feel free to ask!
</response>
gts:
Personal Finance

Don’t Cosign A Loan, Don’t Bet On A Losing Horse

Photo by DDP on Unsplash

Worried about cosigning a loan for someone in need? To help you make the decision easier, remember that people who require cosigners often miss payments and have poor credit. They have a history that depicts poor financial decision-making.

The reason people need a cosign is because they can’t do it alone without your help; they need you. The question is, are you willing to take a chance on the Detroit Lions, whose record is 2 wins-12 losses-1 tie. I wouldn’t.

Yes, we take risks when we make investments, but consigning a loan is not the same thing — it’s entirely different. You’re investing in someone who has already shown you a record of failing financials. In the startup world, this is a major red flag.

Choosing not to help your best friend or sibling get a new car, take out a personal loan, or get a credit card is disheartening — especially if you have the means to help.

What happens if they start missing payments? What happens if they decide they can’t make any payments and you’re stuck with the payments? Will you be okay with that?

Sure! Here’s a draft of your article:

**Atrangi Re: A Cinematic Journey with Flaws**

Dhanush’s performance in Atrangi Re is a standout, bringing depth and nuance to his character, even as the film grapples with some significant flaws. The movie, directed by Dinesh Vijan, is a visually stunning journey that, despite its strengths, is marred by a weak screenplay and some problematic portrayals.

**Praising Dhanush’s Acting and AR Rahman’s Music**

Dhanush delivers a compelling performance as the protagonist, Raj, navigating the complexities of his relationship with the mysterious Atrangi. His portrayal is nuanced and emotionally resonant, making the audience invest in his journey. AR Rahman’s score is a highlight, with his signature melodies adding to the film’s emotional depth and enhancing the overall viewing experience.

**Critiques of the Tamilnadu Sequence and Mental Health Subplot**

However, the film is not without its flaws. The cringe-worthy Tamilnadu sequence, with its over-the-top accents and cultural clichés, fails to capture the subtlety and richness of Tamil traditions. This sequence, while meant to be humorous, often comes across as insensitive and disrespectful.

The mental health subplot is another area where the film falls short. The portrayal of the protagonist’s character as a doctor is undermined by an oversimplified and poorly resolved subplot. The film mishandles the topic, failing to provide the nuance and depth that such a sensitive subject deserves. Given that Dhanush’s character is a doctor, the film’s handling of mental health issues is particularly disappointing.

In conclusion, Atrangi Re is a visually captivating film that excels in its performances and music. However, its flaws in the Tamilnadu sequence and the mental health subplot prevent it from being a perfect cinematic experience. The film’s strengths are overshadowed by these shortcomings, making it a mixed bag that leaves viewers with a sense of unease.
</response>
gts:
I hate Dhanush’s forced humility off screen for obvious reasons but Dhanush on screen is a powerhouse performer. "Atrangi Re" is another testimony to his outstanding acting ability. He makes you laugh when he laughs, he makes you cry when he cries. He is such a terrific actor.

As revealed in the trailer, the movie is about a forced marriage and the aftermath the couple face because of the same. The movie has an interesting plot that can make anyone say "wow" but the screenplay lacks big-time. The movie as a whole was a middling affair that solely relies on performance of the actors.

Sara Ali Khan played her character to perfect while Akshay Kumar was just decent. ARR is the hero behind the screens for the movie. His songs and soulful BGM is what promotes the movie from being average to decent/good. Particularly loved the "Little Little" sequence in the movie. Imo, the best 10 minutes in the movie.

The movie has equal shortcomings to that of the positives. The lack of engaging screenplay, irking logical loopholes, stereotyping tamils(though it's not new in a Bollywood movie, the entire Tamilnadu sequence was a turn off) and inadequate character background are some of the shortcomings of the movie. It's as if the director who wrote terrific first half didn't know how to end the movie in second half.

~Overall, a decent movie that falls short in the latter half. Watch it for Dhanush and AR Rahman.

P.S. : There is some serious ill handled mental issue concept that is sure to stir up arguments in the coming days. Dhanush being a doctor in the movie, it was baffling the way it was treated in the movie.

Sure! Here’s a draft for eMarketer:

**DSP Technology for Middle-Market Brands: Overcoming Programmatic Challenges**

With a total programmatic spend of $133 billion and a 91% media mix share, programmatic advertising has become a cornerstone of digital marketing. However, the minimum spend requirements set by DSP platforms like MediaMath and Trade Desk can be a significant barrier for middle-market brands. These minimums often exceed what these brands can afford, limiting their ability to fully leverage programmatic advertising.

To overcome these challenges, middle-market brands can explore alternative DSPs that offer lower or no minimum spend requirements. For instance, DSPs like Invite.io, AdRoll, and AppNexus provide flexible pricing models that allow brands to start small and scale up as their budgets grow. By using these alternative DSPs, middle-market brands can bypass the minimum spend requirements and access the full benefits of programmatic advertising.

Alternative DSPs offer several advantages:
1. **Flexibility**: Brands can start with a small budget and gradually increase their spend as they see positive results.
2. **Customization**: These platforms often provide more granular control over ad targeting and optimization, allowing brands to tailor their campaigns to specific audience segments.
3. **Cost Efficiency**: Lower minimum spend requirements mean brands can achieve better ROI with smaller budgets, making programmatic advertising more accessible.

In conclusion, middle-market brands can significantly enhance their programmatic advertising efforts by leveraging alternative DSPs that offer lower or no minimum spend requirements. This approach not only helps overcome the barriers posed by traditional DSP platforms but also enables brands to maximize the value of their digital marketing investments.

gts:
DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands

Brittany Wray shares insights on programmatic advertising and its influence on marketing. She highlights the outcomes derived from the said technique creating a win-win situation for all. If you look at most leading indicators for programmatic digital advertising, the trends point steadily upwards with DSP Technology for Middle-market Brands. The latest forecast from eMarketer projects that marketers will spend more dollars on programmatic ($133B), that it will account for a greater share of the media mix (91%), and that a growing and increasingly premium share of available inventory will be transacted programmatically.

It’s Only Middlemen for The Middle Market — Major brands and agencies have long mastered the ins and outs of programmatic tech. Reading the industry trades, one could easily assume that the vast majority of advertisers have followed suit. The simple reason is that they don’t spend enough money on their own to meet the minimums for leading DSPs like MediaMath and The Trade Desk. These arbitrary minimums have excluded the majority of advertisers from the programmatic advertising technology.

It’s a lost opportunity for everyone. These budget minimums have limited the middle market’s autonomy and curtailed its ability to bring advertising operations under their own control. They have disincentivized these companies from developing the talent and budgeting the resources necessary to master this technology and get the most value from it. And they have kept the major DSPs from accessing the largest, most diversified, and therefore most durable segment of advertisers. Instead, middle market companies rely on media agencies (like my company, AudienceX) to manage their digital budgets, essentially acting as surrogate operators of this DSP technology. On the surface, that would seem to benefit digital agencies like us, but in the long run I’m not sure it benefits anyone.

For more such updates, check Out recent Martech Cube guest blogs.

The Global Short Bowel Syndrome (SBS) Market was valued at approximately $612 million in 2019, with a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 27% from 2015 to 2025. Key drivers include Inflammatory Bowel Disease (IBD) and increased government healthcare spending.

IBD, a chronic inflammatory condition affecting the gastrointestinal tract, is a significant contributor to the growth of the SBS market. The rising incidence of IBD, particularly Crohn’s disease and ulcerative colitis, is driving the demand for treatments and therapies that can manage the symptoms and prevent complications, including short bowel syndrome.

**Additive Manufacturing in Dubai: Driving Innovation in the Automotive Industry**

Dubai has emerged as a global leader in additive manufacturing (AM), particularly in the automotive sector. The city’s strategic location and supportive government policies have fostered a thriving ecosystem for AM technology. One notable example is Inoventive, a Dubai-based company that has revolutionized the production process with its few-hour production times for automotive components.

Inoventive’s rapid prototyping and production capabilities have significantly reduced the time and cost associated with traditional manufacturing methods. For instance, the company can produce complex automotive parts in a fraction of the time it would take using conventional techniques. This efficiency not only accelerates product development cycles but also enhances the competitiveness of local automotive manufacturers.

The scalability of AM in Dubai is another key advantage. The city’s robust infrastructure and skilled workforce enable the expansion of AM capabilities to meet growing demand. This has led to the establishment of numerous AM-related businesses and research institutions, contributing to the diversification of Dubai’s economy.

Moreover, the integration of AM with sustainable practices is gaining traction. Companies like Inoventive are exploring ways to reduce waste and energy consumption in their operations. For example, they use recycled materials and implement energy-efficient processes to minimize environmental impact.

In conclusion, Dubai’s commitment to AM is driving innovation in the automotive industry, offering both economic benefits and environmental sustainability. As the technology continues to evolve, Dubai is poised to become a global hub for AM, influencing the future of manufacturing worldwide.
</response>

### Top 5 Samsung Smartphones in 2021

Samsung, founded in 1928 as a grocery store, has since risen to become a global tech giant. In 2021, Samsung released several flagship models, including the Galaxy S21 series, which were highly anticipated by tech enthusiasts and general readers alike.

#### Galaxy S21 Series
The Galaxy S21 series includes the S21, S21+, and S21 Ultra. These devices are equipped with powerful processors, large batteries, and advanced camera systems.

- **Camera**: The S21 series features a triple-camera setup with a 64MP primary sensor, 12MP ultra-wide lens, and 12MP telephoto lens. The Ultra model adds a 10MP periscope lens for even greater zoom capabilities.
- **Battery**: The S21 and S21+ come with a 4000mAh battery, while the S21 Ultra has a 5000mAh battery, providing ample power for a day’s use.
- **Unique Features**: The S21 Ultra is the first Samsung smartphone to feature a foldable screen, allowing users to switch between a standard smartphone and a tablet-like experience.

#### Galaxy Z Fold 3
The Galaxy Z Fold 3 is a popular foldable smartphone that offers a unique user experience. It features a 7.6-inch dynamic AMOLED display that can be folded into a compact form factor.

- **Camera**: The Z Fold 3 has a 12MP front camera and a 12MP rear camera with a 12MP periscope lens for enhanced zoom capabilities.
- **Battery**: The device comes with a 4360mAh battery, which is sufficient for a day’s use.

#### Galaxy Z Flip 3
The Galaxy Z Flip 3 is another popular foldable smartphone that is more compact and easier to carry. It features a 6.7-inch dynamic AMOLED display that can be folded into a compact form factor.

- **Camera**: The Z Flip 3 has a 10MP front camera and a 12MP rear camera with a 12MP periscope lens for enhanced zoom capabilities.
- **Battery**: The device comes with a 3300mAh battery, which is sufficient for a day’s use.

#### Galaxy A52 5G
For those looking for a more budget-friendly option, the Galaxy A52 5G offers excellent performance and features.

- **Camera**: The A52 5G features a 64MP primary sensor, 12MP ultra-wide lens, and 8MP telephoto lens.

Sure! Here’s a draft for your article:

**Repossession: A Social Critique of Class Tensions and Materialism**

In the upcoming horror film "Repossession," directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, audiences are in for a nightmarish journey that mirrors the social critiques of *Get Out* and *Parasite*. The film delves into the deep-seated class tensions and materialistic excesses that have become hallmarks of contemporary society.

**Social Critique Angle:**
"Repossession" takes a sharp look at the divide between the haves and have-nots, much like *Get Out* did with its exploration of racial tensions in a seemingly utopian suburban setting. The film’s protagonist, a young woman from a lower socioeconomic background, finds herself in a surreal and terrifying situation where her very identity is at stake. This narrative mirrors the themes of *Get Out*, where the protagonist, played by *Get Out*’s star, is manipulated and exploited by a wealthy family.

Similarly, "Repossession" draws parallels with *Parasite*, where the Kim family’s descent into chaos and horror is a stark commentary on the dangers of materialism and the thin line between privilege and poverty. In "Repossession," the protagonist’s struggle to survive in a world where her very existence is questioned highlights the film’s critique of materialism and the societal pressures that come with it.

**Festival Buzz and Director/Credits:**
The film has already generated significant buzz at various film festivals, including the Sundance Film Festival, where it received critical acclaim. Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard bring a unique perspective to the horror genre, blending psychological horror with social commentary. Their previous works, such as *The Other Side* and *The Last Resort*, have already established them as talented filmmakers with a keen eye for storytelling.

**Distribution:**
"Repossession" will be released in December 2021 by Gravitas Ventures, ensuring a wide distribution across theaters and digital platforms. The film’s release coincides with the holiday season, providing a perfect opportunity for audiences to experience the terror and social commentary that "Repossession" offers.

In conclusion, "Repossession" is not just a horror film; it’s a social critique that resonates with contemporary issues of class and materialism. With its compelling narrative, talented directors, and festival buzz, the film is poised to be a standout in the horror genre.
</response>
gts:
Repossession, produced, written and directed by Ming Siu Goh and Scott C. Hillyard, will see a North America release via Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021. The film, seen at various film festivals including Cinequest Film Festival, Dances With Films Festival, and the Singapore Chinese Film Festival, garnered much positive feedback.

Video Credit: Film Threat

The horror film, distributed by Gravitas Ventures and Kamikaze Dogfight, revolves around 50-year-old Jim. Jim has managed to construct for himself a perfect life in the world’s most expensive city. Curiously, when Jim is unexpectedly laid off, he desperately clings onto the symbols of his success. Not long thereafter, plauged by his past, we find Jim wrestling with resurfacing demons.

Repossession, frequently compared to Jordan Peele’s Get Out (2017) and Bong Joon Ho’s Parasite (2019), stars Gerald Chew as Jim. Chew’s previous work includes The Tattooist (2007), Apprentice (2016), and Wonder Boy (2017). More recently, playing Tommy ‘The Scorpion’ Chow, the actor could be seen in the Dean Devlin/Gary Rosen co-created television series Almost Paradise.

Video Credit: Cinequest

Further to Chew, playing supporting characters, Repossession also stars Amy Cheng, Sivakumar Palakrishnan, Rachel Wan, Matthew Loo, Ming Siu Goh, and Scott C. Hillyard. Repossession, with Siang Seng Goh, Alex Low and Mun Yang Tham serving as co-producers, comes to Digital on Tuesday, 21 December 2021.
